Scratch.meta: This is a test layer for editing and drawing geometries.

infoj.label: RP Count
infoj.fieldfx: (SELECT sum(1) FROM dev.retailpoints, dev.scratch WHERE st_intersects(dev.retailpoints.geom, st_transform(dev.scratch.geom_3857, 4326)) AND dev.scratch.id = $1)

Health.meta: A subset of collection of points of interest across the UK including healthcare locations, law and order sites along with sport & leisure facilities, car parks, cinemas and service areas.

columns.title: Population
columns.fieldfx: SUM(b.pop__11) as pop__11_10min, SUM(b.pop__12) as pop__12_10min, SUM(b.pop__13) as pop__13_10min, SUM(b.pop__14) as pop__14_10min, SUM(b.pop__15) as pop__15_10min, SUM(b.pop__16) as pop__16_10min, SUM(b.pop__17) as pop__17_10min FROM dev.uk_glx_sites a, geodata.uk_glx_geodata_hex_1k b WHERE a.id = $1 AND st_intersects(a.isoline_10min, b.geom_p_4326)

rows.fieldfx: SUM(case when ST_distance(ST_Transform(a.geom_4326,27700),ST_transform(b.geom_p_4326,27700))<=250 then b.workers else 0 end)
rows.title: Workers 250m

rows.fieldfx: SUM(case when ST_distance(ST_Transform(a.geom_4326,27700),ST_transform(b.geom_p_4326,27700))<=500 then b.workers else 0 end)
rows.title: Workers 500m

columns.aspatial: oac_1a_uk, oac_1b_uk, oac_1c_uk, oac_2a_uk,oac_2b_uk, oac_2c_uk, oac_2d_uk, oac_3a_uk, oac_3b_uk, oac_3c_uk, oac_3d_uk, oac_4a_uk, oac_4b_uk, oac_4c_uk, oac_5a_uk, oac_5b_uk, oac_6a_uk, oac_6b_uk, oac_7a_uk, oac_7b_uk, oac_7c_uk, oac_7d_uk, oac_8a_uk, oac_8b_uk, oac_8c_uk, oac_8d_uk, oac_total_uk FROM mapp.report_summary

rows.fieldfx: round(SUM(CASE WHEN oac_group=1 THEN pop__17 ELSE 0 END))
rows.title: 1a - Farming communities

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=2 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 1b - Rural tenants

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=3 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 1c - Ageing rural dwellers

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=4 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 2a - Students around campus

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=5 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 2b - Inner city students

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=6 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 2c - Comforable cosmopolitans

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=7 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 2d - Aspiring and affluent

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=8 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 3a - Ethnic family life

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=9 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 3b - Endeavouring ethnic mix

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=10 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 3c - Ethnic dynamics

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=11 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 3d - Aspirational techies

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=12 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 4a - Rented family living

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=13 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 4b - Challenged Asian terraces

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=14 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 4c - Asian traits

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=15 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 5a - Urban professionals and families

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=16 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 5b - Ageing urban living

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=17 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 6a - Suburban achievers

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=18 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 6b - Semi-detached suburbia

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=19 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 7a - Challenged diversity

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=20 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 7b - Constrained flat dwellers

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=21 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 7c - White communities

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group=22 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: 7d - Ageing city dwellers

rows.fieldfx: round(sum(case when oac_group>0 then pop__17 else 0 end))
rows.title: Total

columns.aspatial: age_under_18_uk, age_18to24_uk, age_25to29_uk, age_30to44_uk, age_45to59_uk, age_60plus_uk, age_total_uk FROM mapp.report_summary

rows.fieldfx: round(SUM(pop__11 - age_18to19__11 - age_20to24__11 - age_25to29__11 - age_30to44__11 - age_45to59__11 - age60plus))

columns.aspatial: social_grade_ab_uk, social_grade_c1_uk, social_grade_c2_uk, social_grade_de_uk, social_grade_total_uk FROM mapp.report_summary

infoj.name: All catchments
infoj.fieldfx: SELECT jsonb_build_object('type', 'FeatureCollection','features', b.features) AS collection FROM (SELECT jsonb_build_array(jsonb_build_object('type', 'Feature','properties', jsonb_build_object('catchment', 'primary', 'id', id),'geometry', ST_AsGeoJson(catchment_primary)::jsonb),jsonb_build_object('type', 'Feature','properties', jsonb_build_object('catchment', 'secondary', 'id', id),'geometry', ST_AsGeoJson(catchment_secondary)::jsonb),jsonb_build_object('type', 'Feature','properties', jsonb_build_object('catchment', 'tertiary', 'id', id),'geometry', ST_AsGeoJson(catchment_tertiary)::jsonb)) AS features FROM (SELECT * FROM dev.storelist_1507__19 where id = $1) a) b
